subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Robin Soderling beat Juan Mónaco, 6-3, 7-6 (4), to win the Swedish Open in Bastad for his fourth ATP Tour title and first on clay. Soderling became the first Swedish winner of the event since 2000.
snippet: Robin Soderling beat Juan Mónaco, 6-3, 7-6 (4), to win the Swedish Open in Bastad for his fourth ATP Tour title and first on clay. Soderling became the first Swedish winner of the event since 2000.
